section.p: Patient that is receiving various professional services, activities, or methods concretely concerned with the support, treatment, and material designed to aid and to increase their welfare as recommended by a Social Worker.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] datePlacedInRchProgram with data type Point In Time
Contains the date patient was placed in RCH.

Contains exactly one [1..1] dateRemovedFromRchProgram with data type Point In Time
Contains the date in which the patient was removed from the home.

Contains exactly one [1..1] isFalseHighRisk with data type Boolean
This contains information used to indicate that the patient was not a high-risk case.

Contains exactly one [1..1] isPatientHighRisk with data type Boolean
Contains textual informaion that when patients should they be found to be a possible high-risk case.

Contains exactly one [1..1] wasSeenBySocialWorkService with data type Boolean
Contains information to indicate if the patient was seen by the Social Work Service after being identified as a possible high-risk patient.

Contains exactly one [1..1] wasPatientRemoved with data type Boolean
Identifies whether the patient was removed from the RCH placement.
Contains exactly one [1..1] patient, where its type is Patient

Contains zero or one [0..1] rchPlacement , where its type is ResidentialCareHomePlacement
Contains information used to show and determine what the monthly rate is being paid for residential care home stay.
This is the association to the information used to show and determine what the monthly rate is being paid for residential care home stay

Contains exactly one [1..1] datePlacedInRchProgram with data type Point In Time
Contains the date patient was placed in RCH.

Contains exactly one [1..1] dateRemovedFromRchProgram with data type Point In Time
Contains the date in which the patient was removed from the home.

Contains exactly one [1..1] isFalseHighRisk with data type Boolean
This contains information used to indicate that the patient was not a high-risk case.

Contains exactly one [1..1] isPatientHighRisk with data type Boolean
Contains textual informaion that when patients should they be found to be a possible high-risk case.

Contains exactly one [1..1] wasSeenBySocialWorkService with data type Boolean
Contains information to indicate if the patient was seen by the Social Work Service after being identified as a possible high-risk patient.

Contains exactly one [1..1] wasPatientRemoved with data type Boolean
Identifies whether the patient was removed from the RCH placement.
Contains exactly one [1..1] patient, where its type is Patient

Contains zero or one [0..1] rchPlacement , where its type is ResidentialCareHomePlacement
Contains information used to show and determine what the monthly rate is being paid for residential care home stay.
This is the association to the information used to show and determine what the monthly rate is being paid for residential care home stay
